column2: The §Y$TITLE$§! is, de jure, a vassal of §Y$CLAIMANT$'s§!, which is cause enough for war.
column3: Le §Y$TITLE$§! est, de Jure, un vassal de §Y$CLAIMANT$§!, ce qui constitue un motif de guerre suffisant.
column4: §Y$TITLE$§! Ist ein de jure-Vasall von §Y$CLAIMANT$§! - Grund genug für einen Krieg.
column6: El §Y$TITLE$§! es, de iure, vasallo de §Y$CLAIMANT$§!, lo cual es motivo suficiente de guerra.

column2: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! has no holy war cooldown in effect, or cooldowns have been disabled.\n
§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! has no coastal republic CB cooldown in effect, or cooldowns have been disabled.\n

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes all de jure territory occupied within the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!.\n§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes or vassalizes all titles in the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! belonging to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
